Job Description: Work with other members in the team to implement user stores, enhancements, and fix defects      Debug, Troubleshoot issues, and provide fixes      Enhance features and Implement new features based on requirements      Participate in design and code reviews      Work with other developers and backend engineers while implementing features and fixing bugs    Skills/Requirements   You have:     4 years of experience      Experience in visualization, dashboard using kibana and elasticsearch      Experience in building kibana plugins      Good coding skills with Java      Experience with Spring Boot framework      Experience building web applications      Good understanding of object oriented design / OOPS concepts      Understanding of Spring Security, and RESTful API development using Sprint Web MVC      Understanding of Spring Data JPA      Hands on knowledge of Linux OS(RHEL/Ubuntu), shell scripting and Git      Understanding of OAuth 2.0 and OIDC protocol
